label: Date of Application
description: The date when the application was filled out.

label: BUSINESS NAME
description: The name of the business applying for the permit.

label: BUSINESS ADDRESS
description: The street address of the business.

label: UNIT
description: The unit number of the business address, if applicable.

label: CITY
description: The city where the business is located.

label: ZIP CODE
description: The postal zip code of the business location.

label: OWNER'S NAME
description: The name of the owner of the business.

label: E-MAIL ADDRESS
description: The email address of the business owner.

label: PHONE #
description: The telephone number of the business owner.

label: Send invoice to business address
description: Checkbox to select if the invoice should be sent to the business address.

label: Send invoice to address below
description: Checkbox to select if the invoice should be sent to a different address specified below.

label: ADDRESS
description: The address to send the invoice if different from the business address.

label: UNIT
description: The unit number of the alternate address for invoicing.

label: CITY
description: The city of the alternate address for invoicing.

label: STATE
description: The state of the alternate address for invoicing.

label: ZIP
description: The zip code of the alternate address for invoicing.

label: Initial Application Review
description: Checkbox to apply for an initial application review that includes a home kitchen evaluation, application, review of standard operating procedures, and review of menu.

label: Site evaluation fee
description: Checkbox for applying for a site evaluation for changes made to the menu or equipment after initial approval.
